name: http-kv-service-hono
description: A WebAssembly component HTTP service powered by Hono using the wasi:http WIT interface

scripts.generate:types: rimraf generated/types && jco types wit/ -o generated/types
scripts.setup:wit: npm run fetch:wit && npm run generate:types
scripts.build: npm run setup:wit && npm run build:ts && npm run build:component
